TopicTitle: Cowboy Bebop "Red Tail" and "Swordfish II" Showcase + video!

Articles.Content:
**K****OWBOY BEBOP**

Hello once again everyone, Avera9eJoe here with something extra special.

I've been

*very*

busy as of recently (I had a migraine from sleep deprivation Yesterday. No worries I'm fine now
![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
), but I've found the time to build another replica from my favorite anime, Cowboy Bebop. I hope you enjoy the Red Tail.

[**Embed broken? Watch here!**](http://www.twitch.tv/avera9ejoe/c/6454689)

<object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" height="378" width="620" data="https://www.twitch.tv/widgets/live_embed_player.swf?channel=avera9ejoe"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="never"><param name="allowNetworking" value="internal"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="false"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/live_embed_player.swf"><param name="flashvars" value="hostname=www.twitch.tv&channel=avera9ejoe&auto_play=false&start_volume=25"></object>
<iframe frameborder="0" scrolling="no" width="350" height="378"></iframe>

I'm posting this in KSP Fanworks because I'm truly modelling these off of Cowboy Bebop and not for the sake of sharing the craft, though feel free to fly 'em if you want. Moderators feel free to move it elsewhere if deemed more appropriate.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/ztAef)

[Swordfish II (Dropbox)](https://www.dropbox.com/s/bjls8v8u6s8j6f0/Swordfish%20II.craft?dl=0)

And as all episodes end,

***SEE YOU SPACE COWBOY...***
